backend/main.mo: Motoko backend handling contact form submissions, user profiles, and admin‑gated queries with AccessControl authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented branding and favicon updates along with affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing predefined summaries for major frontend components and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and CSS variable definitions establishing light/dark theme colors and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata and linking the generated favicon and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component wiring all page sections and smooth-scroll navigation via refs.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Reusable logo image component rendering the SolviroStudio header asset with adjustable sizing.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with logo, navigation links, contact info, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/GradientButton.t: Wrapper around Button applying the brand gradient styling to CTAs.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders an About section with a description of SolviroStudio, an image, and three feature cards. Includes a Learn More button callback.
frontend/src/components/sections/ClientR: Displays client results with performance graphic cards and a CTA button. Uses a grid of result images and a final call‑to‑action card.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Implements a contact form with email, phone info, and validation states using a custom submit hook. Includes form handling and informational cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Shows a full‑screen hero with headline, subtext, and a Get Started button. Styled with gradient background and overlay.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Renders a portfolio grid of solar marketing projects with images and performance metrics. Includes a button to view the full portfolio.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Lists three service offerings with icons and descriptions, followed by a button to explore services. Uses Card components for layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Displays a grid of client testimonials with quotes, authors, roles, and companies. Each testimonial is styled within a Card component.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar showing the logo, scroll‑aware styling, and section navigation buttons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, handling authentication, secret initialization, and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and tracking login status.
Defines a hook to submit a contact form through an actor, with state for submission status and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/config styles plus custom CSS variables, dark mode themes, and brand gradient utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins with brand-specific design tokens.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, architecture notes, and expected assets for the SolviroStudio website build.
